definition: An adjective that describes something as extensive, comprehensive, or wide-ranging. It is commonly used to refer to a body of knowledge, a collection of information, or a set of resources that is vast and covers a wide scope.

examples.german: Das Buch enthält umfangreiche Informationen über die Geschichte der Stadt.
examples.english: The book contains extensive information about the history of the city.

examples.german: Die umfangreiche Studie liefert wichtige Erkenntnisse über den Klimawandel.
examples.english: The comprehensive study provides important insights into climate change.

examples.german: Das Unternehmen bietet ein umfangreiches Sortiment an hochwertigen Produkten.
examples.english: The company offers an extensive range of high-quality products.

examples.german: Die Website bietet umfangreiche Informationen zu verschiedenen Themen.
examples.english: The website provides comprehensive information on various topics.

examples.german: Der Kurs umfasst ein umfangreiches Lehrmaterial und Übungsaufgaben.
examples.english: The course includes extensive teaching materials and practice exercises.
